item.title: Architecture
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description: I’ve spent the past 15 years working with some of the highest traffic websites, web hosting companies, and secure financial institutions to create robust system architectures. Every system I design is based on the following tenets: Security Performance Scalability Multi-tenancy Fault Tolerance Disaster recovery
